name: Blockchain and Virtual Currencies Working Group
goal: The Blockchain and Virtual Currencies Working Group (BVC WG) is a group of industry representatives.The WG aims at fostering an industry-led conversation with European regulators.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Blockchain and virtual currencies related Eu initiatives, policies and legislative files.
